StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CheckIsValidReferrer]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN varchar(9) ) AS
SELECT Count(person_ID) FROM PERSON WHERE Social_Security_Number = @SSN AND ( PERSON_ID in (SELECT MARINE_ID FROM MARINE) OR PERSON_ID in (SELECT MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM MARINE_CANDIDATE) )
